events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their vehicle and another car at an intersection during rush hour.
The claim was categorized as an Auto Accident based on the description of the car collision and damages reported.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to the customer’s case to ensure timely processing and support.
Acknowledgment sent to the customer confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and next steps.
Customer was requested to submit photos of vehicle damage, police report, and insurance policy details.
Customer successfully uploaded all requested documents including photos and official accident report.
Investigation team began reviewing submitted documents and contacted involved parties to verify details.
Investigation concluded with confirmation of fault and assessment of damages for fair claim settlement.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering vehicle repairs and rental car reimbursement.
Customer responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the communication.
The claim was officially approved based on accepted settlement terms and vehicle damage validation.
Payment for vehicle repair costs was issued to the customer’s designated bank account promptly.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after successful payment and confirmation from the customer.
